name: Kit.co – Share your Product Recommendations
author: Kit.co

sections.description:
About Kit.co (formerly kit.com)

Kit is a community to discover, discuss and get interesting products – grouped into kits – for activities like traveling, DJing, cooking, cycling and more. To learn more about Kit, please click here.

About Kit WordPress Plugin

kit.co WordPress Plugin is a free plugin for WordPress. The plugin enables you to paste links to your kits on kit.co and generate interactive, shoppable modules of your favorite products that you recommend, directly on your WordPress blog.

Note

By installing this plugin you agree to accept kit.co’s Terms of Use.
sections.installation:
Sign up for kit.co

Sign up for a free account at kit.co. Create kits of your favorite products that you use and recommend.

Automatic Installation

  1. Log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.
  2. Search for “kit.com”. Click “Install Now”.

Manual Installation

If you are self-hosting your WordPress blog you can use the following instructions:

  1. Make a ‘kit-com’ directory in ‘/wp-content/plugins/’.
  2. Upload all files into the
    ‘/wp-content/plugins/kit-co/’ directory.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Where can I find more information on kit.co?

You can find out more on kit.co and you can find answers to many frequently asked questions on our FAQ.

How does the plugin work?

kit.co supports the oEmbed protocol (http://oembed.com/) for allowing embedded representations of kit urls on third party sites. This plugin uses the wordpress function wp_oembed_add_provider to register kit.co as an oEmbed provider for your blog, allowing all users who can write posts to paste kit.co links and have them automatically replaced with interactive embed modules in the body of a post or page.

How much do Kit and this plugin cost to use?

It is free to create an account on kit.co as well as to use the WordPress plugin.
